file_content.text: Our favorite customer--good to see you! Business is looking up thanks to your patronage.
Ah, welcome back to Surik Varr's Sundries and Esoterica, valued customer!
And with the death of Thorin Rist, you've defeated a man few thought possible. Well done, friend.
The assassins of House Rist are no easy foes. You're to be commended for what you've accomplished this day.
Thanks.
We are quite pleased you stopped by our humble shop!
Let's discuss my compensation.
Can I finally leave?
Don't forget your reward!
Here you are--from my private collection. I hope you find it useful.
The assassins will strike very soon, now. You mustn't delay.
Welcome, welcome! Browse and delight at the menagerie of values to be found among Surik Varr's Sundries and Esoterica!
General Kashim speaks highly of you, Master Jedi. The Republic requires your aid once again.
Your defense of the Republic is known to us, Master Jedi. The Republic needs your aid this day.
What aid does the Republic require, exactly?
What do you mean?
Her allies are in great danger.
Clearly, the Force has guided me here to help.
Then I will serve.
Then we are pleased it did so.
You have earned General Kashim's favor, Lieutenant. The Republic has a mission for you once more.
Your defense of the Republic is well known to us, Lieutenant. A pressing mission calls for your aid.
What are you talking about, what "mission"?
A mission?
Your services bear the approval of General Kashim. The Republic has another job for you.
We've heard of your reputation with the Republic--mouths speak of one who can get jobs done. The Republic has another such job for you.
If this is a matter of importance, the Jedi should be involved.
Why don't I help you?
If the cause is important, the Force would be a powerful ally.
Perhaps I should be included.
If you want to talk about the Republic, talk to me.
The Republic, huh?
Indeed, more help and expertise could be most beneficial to the cause at hand.
You've got an odd way of pushing the merchandise, pal.
Is this a sales pitch?
All right, keep talking.
Is this some kind of trick?
You'll find no tricks here, we assure you.
We are not the merchant we appear to be--we work for the Republic. The Strategic Information Service. This is merely a cover.
If one listens, intelligence flows through this marketplace more freely than anywhere else. And we've just collected some dire intelligence indeed.
A holorecording we procured, looted from a soldier's corpse, reveals that the legendary assassins of House Rist have been contracted to attack our allies.
If you really work for the Republic, call them in to handle this.
Why not ask the SIS?
There is no time! Reinforcements cannot possibly arrive before the assassins strike.
Thorin Rist, one of the house's greatest killers, is leading these assassins. He will not fail unless you intervene.
Ready and willing.
We expected nothing less from a fellow servant of the Republic.
Define 'intervene.'
Like ourselves, the assassins of House Rist have taken cover in this marketplace-- posing as merchants as they stalk their prey.
These assassins will have the codes needed to reach Thorin Rist. Find them, obtain their information, and the path will be clear.
That sounds easy enough.
Clearer than this, I hope.
We apologize, but this operation is delicate. Discretion is necessary.
This scanner has been keyed to Rist blood. If it flows in a merchant's veins, you will know their true identity.
We have spoken long enough. Now, can we interest you in some aged nerf-meat? A delicacy on Alderaan!
You're the spy. [Refuse quest]
We will be here when you realize your worth.
Relics from the ruins of Taris! Balmorran-built weapons and shields! We will not be undersold!
